name: Vox Seeker
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Voice Lock
text: The vox seeker must move toward and attack the source of the nearest voice within 60 feet of it, to the exclusion of all other targets, for as long as it remains operational.

trait.name: Spider Climb
text: The vox seeker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pincer
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 3 lightning damage.

description: Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 270
